trans-unit.source: Update Disk
trans-unit.target: Update Disk

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Disk</languageKeyword> operation updates the label of an existing disk in the image repository that is associated with the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Disk</languageKeyword> operation updates the label of an existing disk in the image repository that is associated with the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Update Disk</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Update Disk</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;disk-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the disk being updated.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;disk-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the disk being updated.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: PUT
trans-unit.target: PUT

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2012-03-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2012-03-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the disk to update.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the disk to update.

trans-unit.source: This element is only used to identify the disk for which the label should be updated and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: This element is only used to identify the disk for which the label should be updated and cannot be changed.

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: Label

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the label of the disk that is to be updated.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the label of the disk that is to be updated.

trans-unit.source: ResizedSizeInGB
trans-unit.target: ResizedSizeInGB

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the underlying blob to the indicated size in GB.
trans-unit.target: Resizes the underlying blob to the indicated size in GB.

trans-unit.source: To use the ResizedSizeInGB property, the version header should be at least 2014-10-01.
trans-unit.target: To use the ResizedSizeInGB property, the version header should be at least 2014-10-01.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: If ResizedSizeInGB is not used, then the API completes synchronously and returns HTTP 200 (OK) if successful.
trans-unit.target: If ResizedSizeInGB is not used, then the API completes synchronously and returns HTTP 200 (OK) if successful.

trans-unit.source: If ResizedSizeInGB is specified, the API returns HTTP 202 (Accepted) and executes asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: If ResizedSizeInGB is specified, the API returns HTTP 202 (Accepted) and executes asynchronously.

trans-unit.source: Then one must poll on the status of the API using <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link>.
trans-unit.target: Then one must poll on the status of the API using <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link>.

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The updated Disk as XML.
trans-unit.target: The updated Disk as XML.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Disks can only be resized to a larger size, they cannot be shrunk.
trans-unit.target: Disks can only be resized to a larger size, they cannot be shrunk.

trans-unit.source: The size in GB cannot include decimals.
trans-unit.target: The size in GB cannot include decimals.

trans-unit.source: To resize a disk, it must not be attached to a running VM.
trans-unit.target: To resize a disk, it must not be attached to a running VM.

trans-unit.source: You can stop the machine without detaching the disk.
trans-unit.target: You can stop the machine without detaching the disk.

trans-unit.source: An error may occur if the disk cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: An error may occur if the disk cannot be resized.

trans-unit.source: Retry the update operation with the same or larger value to recover the disk.
trans-unit.target: Retry the update operation with the same or larger value to recover the disk.
